title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Mitchell and Scott die amid stunt week devastation?
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Mitchell Devereaux (Imran Adam) has been struggling with his developing feelings for Scott Drinkwell (Ross Adams) in Hollyoaks, but the pair are set to be confronted with a lot more than just their feelings in the coming episodes, as they find themselves caught up in the devastation that comes as part of the soap’s signature stunt week.

Mitchell and Scott’s alone time is cut short, as they receive word that Cleo (Nadine Mulkerrin) is headed back home. When she arrives, she attempts to kiss Mitchell, but he pushes her away — and she notices his odd behaviour.

She confides in Mercedes (Jennifer Metcalfe) about Mitchell’s lack of interest in her, and — this conversation proves rather useful — as Cleo devises a way of putting the spark back in their relationship.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

However, things don’t go according to plan — and Mitchell later admits to Scott that sleeping with Cleo would feel like he’s cheating on Anita, and thus he decides to break up with Cleo as a result.

Later in the week, Mitchell and Anita sneak into the florist — but they’ve no idea of the dangers that are lurking outside. Yes, Cindy Cunningham’s (Stephanie Waring) building work spirals out of control, as Breda (Moya Brady) crashes into the cranes — which results in a crack being formed in the village floor. Matters are then made worse, as Luke (Gary Lucy) gets involved in the commotion.

Scott and Anita realise what’s going on when they set their sights upon the emergency services, and thus they attempt to get out of dodge. However, this proves difficult, as the door is jammed shut!

Will the pair be able to escape in time?

Or will they become victims of the wreckage?

One to watch: Tuesday 29th October at 7pm on E4.

description: Mitchell makes a huge decision in regards to his relationship with Cleo, as him and Scott are caught up in the village disaster.
